text: Sargon may refer to different rulers. The name Sargon is what texts in the Bible use, the people were not known as Sargon in their native language: *Sargon of Akkad, also known as Sargon the Great, Mesopotamian king *Šarru-kên I, Assyrian king; the Bible refers to him as Sargon I *Sargon II, Assyrian king
title: Sargon
